# Looking for plots

```{r test-plot, fig.cap="something something"}
plot(1,1)
```

```{r more-plot, fig.cap="something something", fig.width=10}
plot(1,1)
```

```{r more-plot2, fig.height=2, fig.cap="something something"}
plot(1,2)
```

```{r more-plot3, fig.asp=1, fig.cap="something something"}
plot(1,1)
```

```{r blah-plot, fig.wide=TRUE, fig.cap="something something", fig.asp=2}
plot(1,1)
```
